item.title: Samsung Galaxy A71 (8GB RAM + 128GB ROM) Smartphone 1 Year Samsung Warranty Free Shipping
item.detail: 6.7" FHD+ sAMOLED Plus Infinity-U Display 2.2GHz,1.8GHz Octa-Core 8GB RAM, 128GB ROM Expendable up to 512GB Rear Camera : 64.0 MP (F1.8) + 12.0 MP (F2.2) + 5.0 MP (F2.2) +5.0 MP (F2.4) Front Camera : 32MP (F2.2) 4,500 mAH Battery (25W Fast Charging) WiFi + LTE Bluetooth v5.0 + NFC Dual Sim + MicroSD Accelerometer, Fingerprint Sensor, Gyro Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, Hall Sensor, RGB Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor
